Blade and Bloom Rich Face Serum

Brand: Blade + Bloom

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: sesame*, sweet almond*, evening primrose*, jojoba*, meadowfoam,
sea buckthorn* + vitamin e oils, rose geranium, cedarwood, ylang ylang, petitgrain,
frankincense + rosemary essential oils (*organic)

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity;
es & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
